title: Testimonials Widget
description: A widget that displays a collection of customer testimonials with optional slider functionality

labelColor.description: Color for labels and text content

backgroundColor.description: Background color for the testimonial cards

verifiedIcon.description: URL for the verified purchase icon

starIcon.description: URL for the star rating icon

pillColor.description: Background color for the pill/tag element

pillTextColor.description: Text color for the pill/tag element

sliderConfig.description: Configuration options for the slider display

slidesToShow.description: Number of slides to show at once on mobile

slidesToShowDesktop.description: Number of slides to show at once on desktop

aspectRatio.description: Aspect ratio for the slider items

showPeek.description: Whether to show a peek of the next slide

peekVariant.description: Size of the peek for the next slide

items.description: Array of testimonial items to display

media.description: Media associated with the testimonial (usually customer photo)

title.description: Title or headline for the testimonial

pill.description: Optional tag or category label displayed as a pill

authorInfo.description: Information about the author of the testimonial (name, location, etc.)

rating.description: Rating value given by the customer
